product_name: Moving Comfort Fiona Sports Bra - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Moving Comfort Fiona sports bra offers maximum support, breathability and moisture-wicking comfort for high-impact activities whether it's a kickboxing class or your evening run. DryLayer(R) fabric is engineered to transfer moisture from your skin to the outside of the fabric where it quickly disperses and evaporates. Compression exterior offers support while interior molded cups provide encapsulation-style shape and support. Front yoke is one-way stretch power mesh fabric that limits vertical movement. Back lining and straps offer firm support with 2-way stretch power mesh. Straps are stabilized for added support and lined with soft fabric for comfort; front adjustments allow a custom fit. 3 rows of hooks and eyes with 3 adjustment positions provide enhanced support and a custom fit. Plush-back bottom band ensures firm support. Proportions and contours of neck and armholes on the Moving Comfort Fiona sports are engineered to minimize chafing. Closeout.
short_description: The Moving Comfort Fiona sports bra offers maximum support, breathability and moisture-wicking comfort for high-impact activities whether it's a kickboxing class or your evening run.
